imdb.plot outline: A terrible accident happens on a street of the capital city. The limo of billionaire Shumin, the head of "Bosomoil" oil company, having jumped into oncoming traffic, crushes into the car of doctor Krasnov. The doctor dies, and his pregnant wife Eugenia gives birth in the Emergency Ambulance on the way to maternity hospital. The Board of Directors of "Bosomoil" hires the "problem solver" Luzhin. He is supposed to keep things quiet and to protect Shumin from any accusations. But there is a person who knows the truth and fights for justice. Journalist Baksarov confronts Luzhin to expose the lie of rich company.
imdb.title: Crash
